text: Dovlatov () is a 2018 Russian Polish Serbian biographical drama movie directed by Aleksei German. It stars Milan Marić, Danila Kozlovsky, Anton Shagin, Svetlana Khodchenkova, Elena Lyadova and Piotr Gąsowski. ==Other websites== * * Category:2018 drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2010s historical movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Polish biographical movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: Dovlatov (movie)
